Name: P6-LR "Rime" Sniper Rifle
Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Sniper Rifle
Class: Ballistic

Magazine Size: 8
Rate Of Fire: 20 rpm
Effective Range: 120 m

Attachments: Optics (S3), Barrel (S2), Underbarrel (S2)

The Behring P6-LR ballistic sniper rifle more than makes up for its slow rate of fire with a high powered 8mm round that's effective from long range. Featuring a scope with variable zoom modes and a barrel composed of a proprietary high-strength alloy, the P6-LR was designed to deliver when needed most.

InstalledItem.Name: P6-LR Magazine (8 cap)
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Magazine
Capacity: 8

This magazine for the Behring P6-LR sniper rifle holds eight 8mm rounds.

InstalledItem.Name: EE16 (16x Telescopic)
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Type: Telescopic  
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 16x
Size: S3

Get a clear view of your target from afar with the EE16. Behring craftsmanship produced a 16x scope that's lightweight, durable, and deadly accurate. A rigorous 22-step testing process ensures the EE16 can deliver precision targeting even after encountering extreme weather or surviving battlefield wear and tear.
